skills.name: Bull's Eye
skills.description: Shoots 2 precise shots that are aimed for the enemy's weak spots. Each hit has a 25% chance to ignore the enemy's Defense.

skill_effect.name: Ignore DEF
skill_effect.description: Attack will ignore the target's defense.

skills.name: Arrow of Purification
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an arrow to remove 1 beneficial effect granted on the target. Your Attack Bar will be increased by 50% after the attack.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Trigger Happy
skills.description: Unleashes a relentless attack with arrows on random enemies (4 hits total) and increases the ally’s Attack Bar by 25% after the attack.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.
